title: More type on guitars
content:
Here’s another nameplate inlay with letters carved through a slab of mother of pearl:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201083832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/13740_nameplateM_5944.jpg)

I also got some [advice from Typophilers](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201083832/http:/typophile.com/node/31676) about the Hindi inlay on this guitar:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201083832im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/13740_inlayM_4303.jpg)

More pictures and details can be found on my [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201083832/http:/www.alembic.com/info/fc_stubby.html).
author: mica

comments.content: That burlwood looks really cool. What’s a guitar like that go for? Saw the site, there’s a lot of handcrafted touches. Very nice.
Thanks for your kind words. The model this guitar is based on starts out at about $7K. The options on this one bring it to about double that.
